content: संभावित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Considered, supposed, imagined; पित्राहं दोषेषु संभावितः <ls>K.</ls> {@--2@} Esteemed, honoured, respected; <ls>Bh. 2. 34</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 11.</ls> {@--3@} Respectable, honourable. {@--4@} Suited, fitted, adequate, fit. {@--5@} Possible. {@--6@} Derived, produced, got; <ls>Māl. 5.</ls> {@--7@} Satisfied.
